trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> class represents a schema class definition that is contained in the schema partition.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> representa uma definição de classe de esquema contida na partição de esquema.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> object that specifies the context for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> que especifica o contexto deste objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the LDAP display name for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o nome de exibição LDAP para este objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass.Save%2A> method must be called to commit the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> object that was created to the underlying directory store.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass.Save%2A> método deve ser chamado para confirmar o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> objeto que foi criado para o repositório de diretório subjacente.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> does not refer to a valid <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> or <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet" />, <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" /> não faz referência a um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> ou <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet" /> válido, <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> or <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" /> ou <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> object that contains the auxiliary classes of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> que contém as classes auxiliares do objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> object that contains <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objects that represent the auxiliary classes of the current schema class object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> objeto que contém <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objetos que representam as classes auxiliares do objeto de classe de esquema atual.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada ao serviço do diretório subjacente resultou em um erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não disponível.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Common Name (CN) of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o CN (Nome comum) do objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the CN of the current class object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o CN do objeto de classe atual.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada ao serviço do diretório subjacente resultou em um erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não disponível.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity" /> descriptor of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o descritor <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity" /> padrão do objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity" /> object that represents the default security descriptor for the current schema class object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity" /> objeto que representa o descritor de segurança padrão para o objeto de classe de esquema atual.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada ao serviço do diretório subjacente resultou em um erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não disponível.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a description of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma descrição do objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains a description of the current class object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém uma descrição do objeto de classe atual.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada ao serviço do diretório subjacente resultou em um erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não disponível.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos usados pelo objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos usados pelo objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the managed resources should be released; <see langword="false" /> if only the unmanaged resources should be released.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os recursos gerenciados devem ser liberados; <see langword="false" /> se apenas os recursos não gerenciados devem ser liberados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object and, optionally, releases unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> e libera, opcionalmente, os recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> object that specifies the context for the search.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> que especifica o contexto da pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the LDAP display name of the schema class for the search.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que especifica o nome de exibição LDAP da classe de esquema para a pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object in the Active Directory Domain Services schema partition that matches a given directory context and name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> na partição de esquema do Active Directory Domain Services que corresponde a um nome e contexto de diretório especificados.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object for the schema class that was found.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> para a classe de esquema foi encontrada.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="null" /> if the class was not found.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <see langword="null" /> se a classe não foi encontrada.

trans-unit.source: The object was not found.
trans-unit.target: O objeto não foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> does not refer to a valid <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> or <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet" />, <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" /> não faz referência a um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> ou <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet" /> válido, <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> or <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" /> ou <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> collection that contains all properties, including ancestor properties, of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> que contém todas as propriedades, incluindo propriedades de ancestral, do objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> collection of the properties of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />, including ancestor properties.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de propriedades <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> da <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />, incluindo -propriedades ancestrais.

trans-unit.source: If the method is called on an unbound object instance, an empty <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection> collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se o método é chamado em uma instância de objeto não acoplado, vazio <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection> coleção será retornada.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada ao serviço do diretório subjacente resultou em um erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não disponível.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> para o objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object that represents the directory entry for the schema class.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> que representa a entrada de diretório da classe de esquema.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object is not a valid instance.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> não é uma instância válida.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object is defunct.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> está expirado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates if the current schema class object is defunct.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> valor que indica se o objeto de classe de esquema atual foi anulado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the object is defunct; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o objeto for expirado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> object that contains the properties that the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> must contain.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> que contém as propriedades que a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> deve conter.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> object that contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> objects that represent the properties that the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object must contain.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> objeto que contém o <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> objetos que representam as propriedades que o <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objeto deve conter.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada ao serviço do diretório subjacente resultou em um erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não disponível.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ldapDisplayName of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o ldapDisplayName do objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topic [LDAP-Display-Name](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_ldapdisplayname.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the ldapDisplayName of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém o ldapDisplayName do <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topic [LDAP-Display-Name](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_ldapdisplayname.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o tópico [nome de exibição LDAP](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_ldapdisplayname.asp) na biblioteca MSDN em [ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the OID for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o OID do objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the OID of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o OID do <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objeto.

trans-unit.target: Uma chamada ao serviço do diretório subjacente resultou em um erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não disponível.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> object that contains the properties that the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> can contain.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> que contém as propriedades que a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> pode conter.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> object that contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> objects that the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object can contain.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> objeto que contém o <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> objetos que o <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objeto pode conter.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.

trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> que contém os objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> que a classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> pode conter.

trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> objeto que contém o <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objetos desta classe pode conter.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada ao serviço do diretório subjacente resultou em um erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não disponível.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> object that contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objects that can contain this class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> que contém os objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> que podem conter essa classe.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> object that contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objects that can contain this class.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> objeto que contém o <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objetos que podem conter essa classe.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não disponível.

trans-unit.source: Commits all changes to the current <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object to the underlying directory store.
trans-unit.target: Confirma todas as alterações no objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> atual para o repositório de diretórios subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The context is an AD LDS configuration set and the AD LDS instance could not be found.
trans-unit.target: O contexto é um conjunto de configuração do AD LDS e não foi possível encontrar a instância de AD LDS.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada ao serviço do diretório subjacente resultou em um erro.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the schemaIDGUID for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o schemaIDGUID para o objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topic "schemaIDGUID" or "Schema-ID-GUID" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, confira o tópico "schemaIDGUID" ou "Schema-ID-GUID" na Biblioteca MSDN, em [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> object that contains the schemaIDGUID for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> objeto que contém o schemaIDGUID para o <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topic "schemaIDGUID" or "Schema-ID-GUID" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o tópico "schemaIDGUID" ou "Esquema-ID-GUID" na biblioteca MSDN em [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass.SchemaGuid%2A> is used in many Active Directory Domain Services configuration operations, such as managing extended rights.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass.SchemaGuid%2A> é usado em muitas operações de configuração de serviços de domínio do Active Directory, como o gerenciamento de direitos estendidos.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada ao serviço do diretório subjacente resultou em um erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não disponível.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the schema class from which the current <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object is derived.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a classe de esquema da qual o objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> atual é derivado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object that contains the schema class from which the current schema class is derived.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objeto que contém a classe de esquema do qual a classe de esquema atual é derivada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> if no schema class was specified during the creation of the current class.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" /> Se nenhuma classe de esquema foi especificada durante a criação da classe atual.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada ao serviço do diretório subjacente resultou em um erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não disponível.

trans-unit.source: Gets the LDAP display name of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome de exibição LDAP do objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the LDAP display name of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o nome de exibição LDAP do objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType" /> type for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType" /> para o objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType" /> value that contains the type of the current <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType" /> valor que contém o tipo de atual <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada ao serviço do diretório subjacente resultou em um erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não disponível.

trans-unit.source: The specified type is not a valid <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType" /> value (applies to set only).
trans-unit.target: O tipo especificado não é um valor <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType" /> válido (aplica-se apenas à definição).
